name: SpaceMerc (Demo)
description:
When the galaxy group is in jeopardy, a hero must come forth, so some smug commander decides to hire one.

Join Cloud "Richard" Stryker on his quest to win an intergalactic war he has no stake or interest in and save the side he just happens to reside in. More importantly, join him in his effort to gain financial security by getting paid.

Oh, and blow stuff up in space. A lot. Blow up all the stuff.

Currently, only a demo is available. The demo contains 18 of the 36 planned weapons and 11 of the 30 planned levels. I'll post a linux build once I can verify that it actually works.
